rules_text:
Permanents you control are black. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card and lose 1 life.
flavor_text: [i]“No colors anymore, I want them to turn black.”[/i]
notes:
Everything Black — Unlike Pluto; Paint It Black — Rolling Stones
